game.title: The SunkenTreasure Hunt
game.objective: Uncover the Sunken Treasures of Atlantis
game.description: Embark on a quest to discover the long-lost artifacts in the depths of the underwater realm. Solve riddles, overcome obstacles, and conquer guardians to find the treasure.

task.description: Search for the map in Emily's library, where it's hidden among her research on Atlantis' secrets.
The key can be found in a hidden chamber near the coral reef. Use your diving skills to uncover its location.
The final challenge awaits you at the bottom of a dark abyss. Prepare for battle against the legendary Kraken.
